pr_title: Add support for missing value fetchers.

timeline.message: Fetch values for text phrase and prefix field types.
Fetch values for search_as_you_type field types.

timeline.bodyText: I think these should be fetching the value from their parent field?  name() is going to return the subfield name here, which won't be in the source.
timeline.author: romseygeek

timeline.bodyText: Same comment as above, I think this needs to use the parent field name?
timeline.author: romseygeek

timeline.bodyText: Same question here, this will try and retrieve the subfield from the source?
timeline.author: romseygeek

timeline.message: Add comment on how internal text fields are handled.
Add warning that MappedFieldType#valueFetcher should never throw.
